name: Infinite Designs

overview:
Infinite Designs is a multiple award-winning business for the audio-visual design, rental and production industry.

As true dedicated industry professionals, their staff is polished, attentive, caring and affable boasting nearly 100 years of combined direct industry experience. Providing the best in talent, expertise and equipment, Infinite Designs is able to meet almost all industry clientÃ¨le needs.

Whether their clients need staging and production for concerts, meetings, events or show support, Infinite Designs is able to offer top-quality service at competitive pricing. Offering the latest in audio-video recording, editing, lighting design, screens, projectors, pipe and drape, microphones, staging, speakers, controllers, and more - Infinite Designs is the best solution for your event needs.
